C

calculate(Double, char) - Method in class calculators.Calculator
Provides four basic arithmetic operations: addition, subtraction, multiplication and division.
calculateAdvanced(char) - Method in class calculators.CalculatorAdvanced
Provides factorial and exponent calculation.The decimal number is rounded using only it's whole part.
Calculator - Class in calculators
Calculator class that provides four basic arithmetic operations.
Calculator() - Constructor for class calculators.Calculator
Initializes a new Calculator object with a default current value set to 0.0
CalculatorAdvanced - Class in calculators
Advanced calculator which provides, besides four basic arithmetic operations, factorial and exponent calculation, along with checking if the number is Armstrong(Narcissistic) or Perfect.
CalculatorAdvanced() - Constructor for class calculators.CalculatorAdvanced
Initializes a new CalculatorAdvanced object with a default current value set to 0.0
CalculatorAdvancedTest - Class in tests
Unit tests for CalculatorAdvanced.
CalculatorAdvancedTest() - Constructor for class tests.CalculatorAdvancedTest
 
calculators - package calculators
Provides utility classes for performing arithmetic operations on decimal numbers.
CalculatorTest - Class in tests
Unit tests for Calculator.
CalculatorTest() - Constructor for class tests.CalculatorTest
